page.title: 18Employment
page.content:
There is lack of employment in the town, however, Abergele is known as the Motor Car Centre of North Wales, with at least 8 garages and only two of them sell petrol, the remainder dealing in the sales of motor cars. Slaters of Abergele employ 50 mechanics 20 staff, 25 salesmen. There is also the Tanyard and a very small industrial estate in Peel Street precision engineering, welders and two depots, largest being coca cola.
However, the area is rural and farming is predominant with a Beast Market held every Monday and two Wednesdays in every month. The town is literally surrounded by caravan sites and the population quadruples during the summer months giving employment to many towns people.
